title: HELP! CSS code: what is the new code for  'puts message page in the middle'
content:
1. I want to put the pane for reading the message in the middle of the layout. I really dislike having to crane my head right all the time.

2. The old css code to enter into Chrome/userChrome.css was:

'/* puts message page in the middle */ threadPaneBox {-moz-box-direction: reverse !important;}'

3. What is the new one? ___________________________________________________________ PERIPHERAL INFO A. I know how to do the rest of it, such as toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets =true B. Change to vertical layout
creator: zens.info

title: app won't open
content: I click on the Thunderbird icon and nothing happens. I cannot get it to open to retrieve emails (100+ a day, mostly junk). I don't have my email passwords so I can't go online to use cpanel webmail. All my digital records are stored in Thunderbird inbox folders. Which I can't access. Any idea what is happening? Since I can't access email, please contact me via text 530 521-5296 or Facebook messenger Hildy Langewis. thank you! I'm on the road for at least a week and not being able to keep up with emails is troubling!
creator: hildy5

title: Lost all Contacts in sidebar
content: Hi I have been used to Thunderbird responding to my beginning to type recipient names with a list of matches. Suddenly it has stopped doing so. I have checked that all my addresses are still present in the Address Book (relief!), but I note that the Contacts sidebar is completely empty (even the Address Book options are missing). I can't find a setting to correct this, and would be very grateful to know how to revert to the previous good performance. Thanks
creator: johnedwards1

title: thinderbord配置文件大小
content: hi 大家好， 我用的是thunderbird115，imap协议收入邮件。我发现我的thunderbird 位置文件夹非常的大有565GB，但是我的邮件占用服务器的空间却只有40GB。我查看了我的配置文件夹里的内容，发现有很多名字为nstmp-数字的文件，有几十个，这些文件大量的占用了我的硬盘空间。想问问这些nstmp文件有什么作用，能不能删除他们，删除他们会对邮件有什么影响吗？谢谢大家。
creator: hsy906
